archimate:Capability.name: C14. Support research
archimate:Capability.documentation: The ability to provide access to a range of statistical publications and datasets covering the performance and outcomes of a screening pathway. This will include external publication of data for research organisations and health service bodies for analytical and research purposes. Providing access to data in different forms with a focus on external access from stakeholders. This will also ensure that participants who are included in screening research trials, will still be captured in the wider screening dataset.

properties.value: Clinical research to inform improvements to pathway design
